title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\ResourceUsageExportConfig
name: ResourceUsageExportConfig
description:
Configuration for exporting cluster resource usages.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.ResourceUsageExportConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.bigquery_destination
params.description: Configuration to use BigQuery as usage export destination.

params.name: data.enable_network_egress_metering
params.description: Whether to enable network egress metering for this cluster. If enabled, a daemonset will be created in the cluster to meter network egress traffic.
